questionTitle: I shouldn't imagine there is ________ on earth who can answer that question.
Children in large families learn how to get ________ with other people.
Hello. Is that 21035? Please put me ________ to the manager.
________ pleasant it is to sit here in the shade!
I'm going to ________ my dress dry-cleaned.
I'm afraid Grandfather's writing is becoming more and more ________.
They had to ________ some trees that had been standing for over a hundred years.
I ________ rather not go by coach, if you don't mind.
"Thank goodness you have come ________!" she exclaimed in relief.
It was a magnificent car which must have belonged to a very ________ person.
I'll give George your message the ________ I see him.
I had a ________ problem with my computer when I started to use it.
She is very stubborn, so it will be difficult to ________ her to go.
In the car park the detective came face ________ face with spy.
I can't afford a TV so we'll just have to do ________ one for the moment.
He is intent ________ passing the examination, but I'm doubtful about his chances.
________ the evening Dick and Mark will meet again.
When he was washing his shirt in the bathroom, the telephone ________.
I am afraid, Mr Jones, that the bank is obliged to refuse your application for an extended ________.
The delay to the fight was brought ________ by bad weather.
